text: Antoine Bellier (born 18 October 1996) is a Swiss tennis player. Bellier has a career high ATP singles ranking of No. 524 achieved on 6 June 2016. He also has a career-high ATP doubles ranking of No. 382 achieved on 20 June 2016. Bellier has won five ITF Futures titles on the ITF Men's Circuit. Bellier will make his ATP main draw debut at the 2016 Swiss Open Gstaad, receiving singles and doubles main draw wildcards. Bellier has represented Switzerland in Davis Cup, where he has a win-loss record of 0–1. ==External links== * * * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Swiss male tennis players Category:Sportspeople from Geneva
title: Antoine Bellier
